response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe is perfectly aligned with your needs and aspirations. This product holds immense value to us at $1,000,000, but given its significance to you, I am confident it would be an invaluable asset in your endeavors.

I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving of $50,000 compared to our standard pricing, and I am hopeful that it will make this remarkable opportunity more accessible to you.

Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product. I am more than happy to discuss its features, benefits, and how it could potentially enhance your business or personal projects.

I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of working together on this exciting venture.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
